sqlMap.sql: ITEM_ID, BOARD_ID, TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, ITEM_DELETE, IMAGE_FILE_ID

ITEM_ID, BOARD_ID, ITEM_PARENT_ID, ITEM_GROUP_ID, STEP, INDENTATION, ITEM_SEQ_ID, ITEM_DISPLAY, TITLE, HIT_COUNT, RECOMMEND_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, LINEREPLY_COUNT, ATTACH_FILE_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, ITEM_DELETE, FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, READ_PERMISSION, IMAGE_FILE_ID, CONTENTS, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE

item.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, item.BOARD_ID AS BOARD_ID, item.ITEM_PARENT_ID AS ITEM_PARENT_ID, item.ITEM_GROUP_ID AS ITEM_GROUP_ID, item.STEP AS STEP, item.INDENTATION AS INDENTATION, item.ITEM_SEQ_ID AS ITEM_SEQ_ID, item.ITEM_DISPLAY AS ITEM_DISPLAY, item.TITLE AS TITLE, item.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT, item.RECOMMEND_COUNT AS RECOMMEND_COUNT, item.REPLY_COUNT AS REPLY_COUNT, item.LINEREPLY_COUNT AS LINEREPLY_COUNT, item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT AS ATTACH_FILE_COUNT, item.START_DATE AS START_DATE, item.END_DATE AS END_DATE, item.ITEM_DELETE AS ITEM_DELETE, item.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION as FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, item.READ_PERMISSION as READ_PERMISSION, item.IMAGE_FILE_ID AS IMAGE_FILE_ID, replace(item.CONTENTS,'HY태고딕','맑은 고딕') AS CONTENTS, item.REGISTER_ID AS REGISTER_ID, item.REGISTER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, item.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE, item.UPDATER_ID AS UPDATER_ID, item.UPDATER_NAME AS UPDATER_NAME, item.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE, usr.TEAM_NAME AS TEAM_NAME, usr.PICTURE_ID AS PICTURE_ID, usr.PROFILE_PICTURE_ID AS PROFILE_PICTURE_ID, isnull(ejd.JOB_DUTY_NAME, ejt.JOB_TITLE_NAME) AS JOB_TITLE_NAME, '' AS JOB_TITLE_ENGLISH_NAME , usr.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, usr.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS USER_ENGLISH_NAME, usr.TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME AS TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME

item.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, item.BOARD_ID AS BOARD_ID, item.ITEM_PARENT_ID AS ITEM_PARENT_ID, item.ITEM_GROUP_ID AS ITEM_GROUP_ID, item.STEP AS STEP, item.INDENTATION AS INDENTATION, item.ITEM_SEQ_ID AS ITEM_SEQ_ID, item.ITEM_DISPLAY AS ITEM_DISPLAY, item.TITLE AS TITLE, item.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT, item.RECOMMEND_COUNT AS RECOMMEND_COUNT, item.REPLY_COUNT AS REPLY_COUNT, item.LINEREPLY_COUNT AS LINEREPLY_COUNT, item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT AS ATTACH_FILE_COUNT, item.START_DATE AS START_DATE, item.END_DATE AS END_DATE, item.ITEM_DELETE AS ITEM_DELETE, item.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION as FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, item.READ_PERMISSION as READ_PERMISSION, item.IMAGE_FILE_ID AS IMAGE_FILE_ID, item.REGISTER_ID AS REGISTER_ID, item.REGISTER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, item.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE, item.UPDATER_ID AS UPDATER_ID, item.UPDATER_NAME AS UPDATER_NAME, item.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE, usr.TEAM_NAME AS TEAM_NAME, usr.PICTURE_ID AS PICTURE_ID, usr.PROFILE_PICTURE_ID AS PROFILE_PICTURE_ID, isnull(ejd.JOB_DUTY_NAME, ejt.JOB_TITLE_NAME) AS JOB_TITLE_NAME, '' AS JOB_TITLE_ENGLISH_NAME , usr.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, usr.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS USER_ENGLISH_NAME, usr.TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME AS TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME
sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listRecentAllBoardItem */ * FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY item.START_DATE DESC, item.REGIST_DATE DESC) AS RNUM,
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code
WHERE item.ITEM_DELETE = 0 ) TBL WHERE RNUM <= #count#

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listRecentBoardItem */ * FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY item.START_DATE DESC, item.REGIST_DATE DESC) AS RNUM,
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code
WHERE item.BOARD_ID = #boardId# ) TBL WHERE RNUM <= #count#

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.batchRemoveItemList */ TOP $getCount$
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM
WHERE ITEM_ID = ITEM_GROUP_ID AND END_DATE < DATEADD(DD, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.get */
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code WHERE item.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND item.ITEM_DELETE = 0

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.get */
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code WHERE item.ITEM_ID IN ( #boardItemIdArray[]# )

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.exists */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID WHERE item.ITEM_ID = #itemId#

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listThreadByItemId */
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code WHERE item.ITEM_GROUP_ID = #itemId# ORDER BY ITEM_GROUP_ID DESC, STEP ASC

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT * FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId# UNION ALL SELECT T.* FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM T, CTE WHERE CTE.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_PARENT_ID ) SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listLowerItemThread */
FROM CTE

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listByBoardId */
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE BOARD_ID = #boardId# ORDER BY INDENTATION DESC, STEP DESC

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listBySearchCondition */ * FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY
item.ITEM_SEQ_ID DESC,
item.ITEM_SEQ_ID ASC,
item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT DESC,
item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT ASC,
item.TITLE DESC,
item.TITLE ASC,
item.REGISTER_NAME DESC,
item.REGISTER_NAME ASC,
item.REGIST_DATE DESC,
item.REGIST_DATE ASC,
item.HIT_COUNT DESC,
item.HIT_COUNT ASC,
item.RECOMMEND_COUNT DESC,
item.RECOMMEND_COUNT ASC,
item.REGIST_DATE DESC, ITEM_DISPLAY DESC, ITEM_GROUP_ID DESC, STEP ASC ) AS RNUM,
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code
INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD board ON item.BOARD_ID = board.BOARD_ID AND board.WORKSPACE_ID = #workspaceId#
WHERE 1=1
AND item.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
AND item.TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND item.REGISTER_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND (item.REGISTER_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%' or item.TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%')
/* ===========================================END */
) A WHERE RNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) TBL WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listBySearchCondition */ * FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY
item.ITEM_SEQ_ID DESC,
item.ITEM_SEQ_ID ASC,
item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT DESC,
item.ATTACH_FILE_COUNT ASC,
item.TITLE DESC,
item.TITLE ASC,
item.REGISTER_NAME DESC,
item.REGISTER_NAME ASC,
item.REGIST_DATE DESC,
item.REGIST_DATE ASC,
item.HIT_COUNT DESC,
item.HIT_COUNT ASC,
item.RECOMMEND_COUNT DESC,
item.RECOMMEND_COUNT ASC,
ITEM_DISPLAY DESC, ITEM_GROUP_ID DESC, STEP ASC ) AS RNUM,
FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE ejt on usr.job_title_code =ejt.job_title_code left outer join IKEP4_EV_JOB_DUTY ejd on usr.job_duty_code = ejd.job_duty_code
INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD board ON item.BOARD_ID = board.BOARD_ID AND board.WORKSPACE_ID = #workspaceId#
WHERE 1=1
AND item.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
AND item.TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND item.REGISTER_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND (item.REGISTER_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%' or item.TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%')
/* ===========================================END */
) A WHERE RNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) TBL WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT /* [Board_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.countBySearchCondition */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM item INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER usr ON item.REGISTER_ID = usr.USER_ID
INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD board ON item.BOARD_ID = board.BOARD_ID AND board.WORKSPACE_ID = #workspaceId#
WHERE 1=1
AND item.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
AND item.TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND item.REGISTER_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
SELECT /* [Board_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.countChildren */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_PARENT_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM ( /* [boardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.insert */ ITEM_ID, BOARD_ID, ITEM_PARENT_ID, ITEM_GROUP_ID, STEP, INDENTATION, ITEM_SEQ_ID, ITEM_DISPLAY, ITEM_TYPE, TITLE, HIT_COUNT, RECOMMEND_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, LINEREPLY_COUNT, ATTACH_FILE_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, ITEM_DELETE, FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, READ_PERMISSION, IMAGE_FILE_ID, CONTENTS, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #itemId#, #boardId#, #itemParentId#, #itemGroupId#, #step#, #indentation#, #itemSeqId#, #itemDisplay#, #itemType#, #title#, #hitCount#, #recommendCount#, #replyCount#, #linereplyCount#, #attachFileCount#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #itemDelete#, #followBoardPermission#, #readPermission#, #imageFileId#, #contents#, #registerId#, #registerName#, #registDate#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #updaterId#, #updaterName#, #registDate# CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
declare @seq numeric(38) exec dbo.GET_SEQUENCE_FROM_SEQ_IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM 2, @seq OUTPUT
SELECT @seq
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.update */ SET BOARD_ID = #boardId#, ITEM_PARENT_ID = #itemParentId#, ITEM_GROUP_ID = #itemGroupId#, STEP = #step#, INDENTATION = #indentation#, ITEM_SEQ_ID = #itemSeqId#, ITEM_DISPLAY = #itemDisplay#, TITLE = #title#, HIT_COUNT = #hitCount#, RECOMMEND_COUNT = #recommendCount#, REPLY_COUNT = #replyCount#, LINEREPLY_COUNT = #linereplyCount#, ATTACH_FILE_COUNT = #attachFileCount#, START_DATE = #startDate#, END_DATE = #endDate#, ITEM_DELETE = #itemDelete#, IMAGE_FILE_ID = #imageFileId#, CONTENTS = #contents#, READ_PERMISSION = #readPermission#, FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = #followBoardPermission#,
UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.logicalDelete */ SET ITEM_DELETE = 1, UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateStep */ SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE ITEM_GROUP_ID = #itemGroupId# AND STEP >= #step#
UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateRecommendCount */ SET RECOMMEND_COUNT = RECOMMEND_COUNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateLinereplyCount */ SET LINEREPLY_COUNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_LINEREPLY WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#) WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateReplyCount */ SET REPLY_COUNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_PARENT_ID = #itemId#) WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateHitCount */ SET HIT_COUNT = HIT_COUNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.delete: WITH CTE AS ( SELECT * FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId# UNION ALL SELECT T.* FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM T, CTE WHERE CTE.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_PARENT_ID ) DELETE FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.physicalDeleteThread */ WHERE ITEM_ID IN ( SELECT ITEM_ID FROM CTE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.dao.boardItem.updateItem */ SET ITEM_DISPLAY = #itemDisplay#, TITLE = #title#, CONTENTS = #contents#, ATTACH_FILE_COUNT = #attachFileCount#, START_DATE = #startDate#, END_DATE = #endDate#, FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = #followBoardPermission#, READ_PERMISSION = #readPermission#, UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.updateBoardItemMove */ SET BOARD_ID = #targetBoardId#, UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND BOARD_ID=#orgBoardId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] collpack.collaboration.board.board.dao.boardItem.listDeleteBoardItem */ ITEM_ID, BOARD_ID, TITLE, ATTACH_FILE_COUNT FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM WHERE BOARD_ID = #boardId# AND ATTACH_FILE_COUNT>0
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] boardItem.updateMailCount */ SET MAIL_COUNT = MAIL_COUNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM /* [BoardItem_SqlMap.xml] boardItem.updateMblogCount */ SET MBLOG_COUNT = MBLOG_COUNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IKEP4_WS_COUNSEL ( appointment_id, appointment_day, appointment_hour1, appointment_minute1, appointment_hour2, appointment_minute2, appointment_hour3, appointment_minute3, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( #appointmentId#, #appointmentDay#, #appointmentHour1#, #appointmentMinute1#, #appointmentHour2#, #appointmentMinute2#, #appointmentHour3#, #appointmentMinute3#, #registerId#, #registerName#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from IKEP4_WS_COUNSEL where 1=1
AND appointment_Day <= #endDate#
AND appointment_Day >= #startDate#

select appointment_id as appointmentId, appointment_day as appointmentDay, appointment_hour1 as appointmentHour1, appointment_minute1 as appointmentMinute1, appointment_hour2 as appointmentHour2, appointment_minute2 as appointmentMinute2, appointment_hour3 as appointmentHour3, appointment_minute3 as appointmentMinute3, REGISTER_ID as registerId, REGISTER_NAME as registerName, REGIST_DATE as registDate from IKEP4_WS_COUNSEL where 1=1
AND appointment_Day <= #endDate#
AND appointment_Day >= #startDate#
